name: Sweetest Southern Sweet Potato Pie
author: wisweetp
summary: This is a very unique sweet potato pie recipe, given to me by my mother. It's quite sweet, with a lighter texture than your typical sweet potato pie. If you like sweet potatoes and you have a sweet tooth, this one's for you!
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) unbaked deep dish pie crust
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place sweet potatoes in an aluminum foil-lined baking dish
Bake in preheated oven until potatoes are easily pierced with a fork and skin loosens, 30 to 45 minutes
Peel potatoes and mash with a potato masher in a large bowl
Beat sugar, evaporated milk, butter, corn syrup, eggs, flour, vanilla extract, apple pie spice, and salt into mashed sweet potatoes with an electric mixer until fluffy, about 5 minutes
Pour sweet potato batter into pie crust
Excess batter can be reserved for another use
Bake in preheated oven until pie is set and crust is browned, 45 to 50 minutes
